text:
Anwar Hossain (6 October 1948 – 1 December 2018) was a Bangladeshi photographer and cinematographer.
Biography.
He was born in Dhaka, East Pakistan. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Cinematography a record five times for the movies "Sundori" (1979), "Emiler Goenda Bahini" (1980), "Puraskar" (1983), "Anya Jibon" (1995) and "Lalsalu" (2003).
Hossain died on 1 December 2018 at his hotel room in Dhaka from a heart attack at the age of 70.
